title: Regarding the Acquisition of Certain Assets of EMCORE Corporation by HieFo Corporation
summary: This Presidential Order prohibits the acquisition of certain assets of EMCORE Corporation by HieFo Corporation, citing credible evidence that the transaction might impair U.S. national security. HieFo, controlled by a Chinese citizen, acquired EMCORE's digital chips and related wafer design, fabrication, and processing businesses. The order mandates HieFo to divest all interests in these assets within 180 days, prohibits granting access to these assets or related information to unauthorized personnel, and requires strict compliance measures overseen by the Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States (CFIUS). CFIUS is authorized to audit HieFo, verify the divestment, and impose conditions to mitigate national security risks. The Attorney General is tasked with enforcing the order.
